artefact: Permit for discharges to surface or groundwater (England and Wales)

artefact.overview: You need a permit to discharge anything to the surface or groundwater
artefact.licence_short_description: Permit to discharge anything to inland freshwater, groundwater, estuaries or coastal water.
artefact.licence_overview:
To discharge anything other than clean, uncontaminated water to inland freshwaters (eg rivers, lakes and streams), groundwater (eg boreholes), estuaries and coastal waters, you must have an environmental permit or registered exception from the [Environment Agency.](http://www.environment-agency.gov.uk "Environment Agency"){:rel="external"}

You must comply with all the conditions of your permit or exemption.
